---
title: "Books Catalog"
description: "Browse books by Title, ISBN, Category."
toc: false
page-layout: full
format:
  html:
    css: /assets/css/styles_books_catalog.css # a user-defined customization
    include-after-body:
      - text: |
          <script src="assets/scripts/books_catalog.js"></script>
---

```{=html}

<!-- Top Filters: Search + Category -->
 <div class="top-filters-container">
  <div class="search-bar-filter-container">
    <input type="text" id="search-bar" placeholder="Search by title, ISBN, or author..." />
  </div>

  <div class="category-filter-container">
    <select class="category-filter">
      <option value="">All categories</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <!-- Bottom Filters -->
  <div class="filters-container bottom-filters">
      <select id="items-per-page">
        <option value="5">5 items per page</option>
        <option value="10" selected>10 items per page</option>
        <option value="15">15 items per page</option>
        <option value="20">20 items per page</option>
        <option value="all">All items</option>
      </select>

      <select id="columns-per-row">
        <option value="1">1 column view</option>
        <option value="2">2 columns view</option>
        <option value="3">3 columns view</option>
        <option value="4" selected>4 columns view</option>
      </select>

      <button id="reset-filters">Reset Filters</button>

</div>


<!-- Result Summary -->
<div class="result-summary-container">
    <div id="result-summary"></div>
</div>

<!-- Loading Spinner -->
<div id="loading-spinner" role="status" aria-label="Loading products..."></div>
<!-- Product Grid -->
<div id="product-list" class="product-list"></div>
<!-- Pagination Controls -->
<div id="pagination-controls">
  <button class="pagination-btn" id="first-page">First</button>
  <button class="pagination-btn" id="prev-page">Previous</button>
  <div id="page-numbers"></div>
  <button class="pagination-btn" id="next-page">Next</button>
  <button class="pagination-btn" id="last-page">Last</button>
  <!-- Go to page -->
  <div id="page-jump-container">
    <label for="page-jump-input">Jump to page:</label>
    <input type="number" id="page-jump-input" min="1" aria-label="Jump to page number">
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Template for Product Card -->
<template id="product-template">
  <div class="product-card">
    <img class="product-image" src="" alt="Book cover" />
    <h3 class="product-name"></h3>
    <p class="product-isbn"></p>
    <p class="product-category"></p>
    <p class="product-format"></p>
    <span class="product-price"></span>
  </div>
</template>

```
